dcterms:description: A dataset used as the standard benchmark for text summarization models, containing 286,817 training pairs, 13,368 validation pairs, and 11,487 test pairs, with documents averaging 766 words and summaries averaging 53 words.
dcterms:title: CNN/Daily Mail dataset

dcterms:creator: Saptarashmi Bandyopadhyay
dcterms:description: A dataset that incorporates linguistic factors such as lemma and Part-of-Speech tags to improve vocabulary coverage and generalization in neural machine translation.
dcterms:title: Factored dataset
